alert.note: Alert for Obion; Weakley (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 21 at 3:42PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Weakley and northeastern Obion Counties through 415 PM CDT... At 342 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Union City, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Union City, Fulton, South Fulton, Troy, Woodland Mills, Rives, Gibbs, Moffatt, Ruthville, Shaffner, Terrell, McConnell and McCutchen Heights. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for west Tennessee.
